summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2367 for the improvement of Republican Street, from Nob Hill Avenue to Third Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same to a width of sixteen (16) feet; under Ordinance No. 24675, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
